title: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement
description: Bug 120922: 'Dirty Page' behavior in XML Report Designer editor needs improvement. Other pages cannot be used until the source is saved. The user needs to figure out how to save or discard their changes. The dialog asking to save changes is titled 'Error'.
OB: When editing XML in the 'source' view of the Layout Editor and attempting to switch back to the Layout view, an error message is displayed indicating that the changes need to be saved. The error message is titled 'Error'.
EB: The system should provide clearer instructions on how to save or discard changes when switching from the 'source' view to the Layout view in the XML Report Designer editor. The error message should be more informative and descriptive.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the XML Report Designer editor.
2. Edit the XML in the 'source' view.
3. Attempt to switch back to the Layout view.
4. Observe the error message indicating the need to save the changes.
